Contact Information: 708-702-2726 Listing Details on BizBuySell.com
Listing Tools: Email a friend Print this listing Save this listing
Very profitable fast food restaurant located in Elburn IL. Just west of Geneva. Hamburgers/Hot Dogs/Gyros. Great food, Well Known Local Name. This three year old restaurant has excellent sales and profits. Present owner runs this shop absentee and still makes a good profit. Great opportunity to own busy fast food restaurant. Training available. Staff willing to stay. Owner will finance up to 50% for qualified buyer As seen on Post Your Listing on The New York Times» My Listings Sign up for your own account to save listings that interest you!
